original_text: They had not been able to celebrate it at the regular time because not enough priests had consecrated themselves and the people had not assembled in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이는 성결하게 한 제사장들이 부족하고 백성도 예루살렘에 모이지 못하였으므로 그 정한 때에 지킬수 없었음이라

sentences.original_text: They had not been able to celebrate it
because not enough priests had consecrated themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 충분한 제사장들이 자신들을 거룩하게 하지 않았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and the people had not assembled
